Detailed Description

Project compounds a list of lines references.

Project's idea in analogous to the concept of lines as a container of flows. It groups a number of lines that has some objective in common.

Projects references lines using their path. Therefore, a project is a list of lines files. When a line needs to be read or edited you ask the project for its path (see geoxml_project_get_line_source) and then load it with geoxml_document_load. New liness can be added to a project using geoxml_project_append_line.

See also:
line.h

Define Documentation

#define GEOXML_PROJECT ( doc   )     ((GeoXmlProject*)(doc))

Cast project's document doc to GeoXmlProject.

#define GEOXML_PROJECT_LINE ( seq   )     ((GeoXmlProjectLine*)(seq))

Promote a sequence to a project line.

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct geoxml_project GeoXmlProject

Project class.

Inherits GeoXmlDocument

The GeoXmlProject struct contains private data only, and should be accessed using the functions below.

typedef struct geoxml_project_line GeoXmlProjectLine

Represents a reference to a line inside a project.

It contains the path of the line.

The GeoXmlProjectLine struct contains private data only, and should be accessed using the functions below.

Function Documentation

GeoXmlProject* geoxml_project_new (  ) 

Create a new empty project and return a pointer to it.

Returns NULL if memory couldn't be allocated.

GeoXmlProjectLine* geoxml_project_append_line ( GeoXmlProject *  project,
const gchar *  source 
)

Create a new line and append it to list of flows references.

If project or source is NULL returns NULL.

int geoxml_project_get_line ( GeoXmlProject *  project,
GeoXmlSequence **  project_line,
gulong  index 
)

Writes to project_line the index ieth line reference that project belong.

If an error ocurred, the content of project_line is assigned to NULL.

If project is NULL nothing is done.

Returns one of: GEOXML_RETV_SUCCESS, GEOXML_RETV_INVALID_INDEX, GEOXML_RETV_NULL_PTR

glong geoxml_project_get_lines_number ( GeoXmlProject *  project  ) 

Get the number of lines that project has.

If project is NULL returns -1.

void geoxml_project_set_line_source ( GeoXmlProjectLine *  project_line,
const gchar *  source 
)

Set the location of project_line to source.

If project_line is NULL nothing is done.

const gchar* geoxml_project_get_line_source ( GeoXmlProjectLine *  project_line  ) 

Returns the location of the line reference project_line.

If project_line is NULL returns NULL.
